channel.title: Workshops (2022) on SIPPS
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops (2022) on SIPPS

item.title: Coding (2022)
item.description: See below for resources associated with the coding workshops from SIPPS 2022. For materials from other years and/or workshop series, follow this link. Week 1: Setting up your R environment Before the workshop: download these files: data file, RMarkdown file, R Project file After the workshop: RMarkdown file (with answers) Note: If you have trouble knitting your Rmd file, find the code chunk where you load in a set of packages (using the library() function), and remove the text eval = False.

item.title: Professional Development / Journal Club (2022)
item.description: See below for resources associated with the professional development & journal club workshops from SIPPS 2022. For materials from other years and/or workshop series, follow this link. Week 1: Panel with past SIPPS students No additional materials. Week 2: How to read a scientific paper Workshop materials: Literature review spreadsheet template QuALMRI overview QuALMRI literature review outline Godden & Baddeley (1975) Kirkham et al.

item.title: Research Skills (2022)
item.description: See below for resources associated with the research skills workshops from SIPPS 2022. For materials from other years and/or workshop series, follow this link. Week 1: What is a good research question? Workshop materials: Workshop slides Week 2: Literature search & Zotero Workshop materials: Workshop slides Week 3: Organizing your research Before the workshop: Please download (and unzip) this set of files: learnShell.
